General.Name: Eightco Holdings Inc.
General.Description: Eightco Holdings Inc. provides inventory management and corrugated custom packaging solutions in North America and Europe. It operates in two segments, Inventory Management Solutions segment and the Corrugated Packaging Business. It provides funding solutions for e-commerce businesses which sell to other online platforms. Further, the company offers bitcoin mining equipment and co-location services. In addition, it manufactures and sells custom packaging for a wide variety of products. The company was formerly known as Cryptyde, Inc. and changed its name to Eightco Holdings Inc. in April 2023. Eightco Holdings Inc. was incorporated in 1966 and is headquartered in Easton, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 101 Larry Holmes Dr., Easton, PA, United States, 18042
